snippet.title: Best Buy Identifies Store Closings
snippet.description:

By The Associated Press 05:16 PM EDT 04/14/12
The struggling electronics chain identifies the 50 stores that it plans to close this year as part of cost-cutting efforts.

snippet.title: RadioShack's Turnaround Stalls As It Closes Stores
snippet.description:

By Richard Collings 05:08 PM EST 03/04/14
